General.Name: Nova Wellness Group Bhd
General.Description: Nova Wellness Group Berhad, through its subsidiary, Nova Laboratories Sdn Bhd, engages in the development, production, and sale of nutraceutical and skincare products in Malaysia. It operates through House-Brand Products, and Contract Manufacturing and Services segments. The company offers natural supplements, including herbal, vitamin and mineral, and specialty supplements; functional food products comprising herbal tea, coffee, oil powder, bun, chia seed, fiber smoothie, loaf, green juice, croissant, sourdough, nutritional drink, vegetable oil blend, sunflower oil, breakfast drink, cereal, and oat beta-glucan; and medical nutrition products. It also provides skin care products, such as cleansing bars, face and body wash, shampoos and conditioners, feminine intimate wash, herbal essence spray and ointment, body balm, and head wash; calcium tablet, fish oil, vit-c chewable tablet, multivitamins tablets, oral powders, and nutritional drinks for children; and hand sanitizers, face masks, and disinfectant cleaners. The company sells its products under the Healthy Joy, NOVA, ActivMax, Sustinex, SP8, MosOut, Novavis, and NOVTIC brand names through outlets and online stores. In addition, it provides contract manufacturing services for nutraceutical products. As of March 31, 2022, the company operated 960 outlets. Nova Wellness Group Berhad was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Sungai Pelek, Malaysia.
